VocabWordclass

Details

A VocabWord is an entry in a Mentionable object's list of noun phrase words. `class `**`VocabWord`**` :   object`

Superclass Tree   (in declaration order)

VocabWord
`         object`

Subclass Tree  

(none)

(none)

Summary of Methods

Properties  

posFlags

thing.t[777]

the part-of-speech flags (MatchNoun, etc)

strengthFlags

thing.t[780]

the required match strength flags (MatchNoTrunc, MatchNoApprox)

wordStr

thing.t[774]

the word string (the text of this vocabulary word)
